snippet.title: Split: Fighting Cold Update Trailer
snippet.description:
Are you excited? Of course you are, why wouldn't you be. After all the bugfixes, balance changes, boss reworks and such, we're finally ready to announce the new update! Yes, it doesn't look that big, but we've made changes to almost everything in the mod over the past months, so it's best if you start a new adventure and don't miss out on all the new content and secrets we've prepared! See you on November 6th!

Terraria Forums page: 
https://forums.terraria.org/index.php?threads%2Freleased-wip-the-split-mod.65235%2F

Join our Discord server to receive latest news and spoilers: 
https://discord.gg/splitmod

Support us on Patreon: 
https://www.patreon.com/splitMod?fan_landing=true

Check out the awesome guy who did the art at the end (and many more!): 
https://twitter.com/FloorsWash
